modName: Dremora Overhaul And Playable Coldharbour Edition
summary: This Mod Allows you to fully customize your Dremora to the MAX! Also Adds a Dark Anchor To The Vocanic Planes Near Riften and remade all Dremora in game to my new Dremora
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][color=#ff7700]This mod is outdated[/color] [color=#ff7700][size=5] and a new version is available.[/size][/color][size=5] [color=#ff0000]Please note that the new Dremora mod does not have most of the things from this mod like Coldhurbour or the Anchors and the arena's[/color] [/size][/size] [color=#00ff00] [size=4]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81745/?[/size] 
[/color]


[youtube]o9vBH9lcl-A[/youtube] [youtube]zRxVOUJCh5Q[/youtube]

[color=#ff0000][img]http://i.imgur.com/d7mLZy6.png[/img][/color]
THE NEW UPDATE IS OUT!
In this update the castle in [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Coldharbour]Coldharbour[/url] has changed and the arena has changed. To access the castle you must find the Daedric anchor in the swamp between Riften and Windhelm. Also this mod adds [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Xivkyn]Xivkyn[/url] Horns and eyes! Also I redid the stats and also added a Power ability for the dremora race also i never said before but the male dremora can SHOUT! Most lines

To get Mannimarco's armor Shoulders and staff type these below.

Help Mannimarco
Help Worm 

PLEASE NOTE IF YOU HAVE ANYTHING IN THE CASTLE IN A CHEST IT WILL BE DELETED EVERYTHING ELSE WILL JUST TELEPORT TO THE NEW CASTLE INTERIOR AS WELL AS YOU IF YOUR IN THE CASTLE.
[youtube]pJSKtzxq11A[/youtube] [youtube]gVP-zSLuXo4[/youtube]
[color=#fce5cd]
Feel free to post photos or make a video ;)
Remember to endorse if you like this mod :D


This Mod Allows you to fully customize your [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Dremora_(Skyrim)]Dremora[/url] to the MAX! Also Adds a [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Dark_Anchors]Dark Anchor[/url] To The Vocanic Planes Near [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Riften_(Skyrim)]Riften[/url] and remade all [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Dremora_(Skyrim)]Dremora[/url] in game to my new [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Dremora_(Skyrim)]Dremora[/url]

Also Added a [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Dremora_(Skyrim)]Dremora[/url] party with [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Sheogorath]Sheogorath[/url]! and [url=https://www.google.com.au/url?sa=t&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=web&cd=1&ved=0ahUKEwig89X9_83LAhUGtpQKHdSLDFkQFggbMAA&url=http%3A%2F%2Felderscrolls.wikia.com%2Fwiki%2FSanguine_Rose_(Skyrim)&usg=AFQjCNF3FOaWbtIl-ZPM9mj8tLkbYkTi6A&sig2=qm6mOZx8PejXh8j-POmNMA&bvm=bv.117218890,d.dGo&cad=rja]Sanguine[/url] Party!


Want to go to [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Molag_Bal]Molag Bal[/url]'s Realm [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Coldharbour]Coldharbour[/url], you cant go there by foot you need to COC Command.

Want [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Mannimarco]Mannimarco[/url]'s [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Staff_of_Worms]Staff of Worms[/url]' It is on the table from when you enter the Castle in [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Coldharbour]Coldharbour[/url].

Enjoy The Arena I made In [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Coldharbour]Coldharbour[/url]! ITS SO MUCH FUN.[/color]
[url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Console_Commands_(Skyrim)/Locations]Console Commands[/url][color=#ff0000]:[/color]
[color=#00ff00][b]COC MolagStart01[/b]  <Brings you into The entrance of the castle in [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Coldharbour]Coldharbour[/url].
[b]COC MolagArena[/b]    <Brings you into The entrance of the Arena in [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Coldharbour]Coldharbour[/url].

[/color][color=#ff0000]Credits:[/color]
[url=https://www.google.com.au/url?sa=t&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=web&cd=1&ved=0ahUKEwjcxf_-7tzLAhWhHaYKHcNeBEYQFggbMAA&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fmods%2F31229&usg=AFQjCNFEXXYpxXU7mN2aHn03TVjNyMUMvw&sig2=6F7IqvxKxlGcICDVGMCMjg&bvm=bv.117868183,d.dGY&cad=rja]Medusa Drakul armors and Thanatos dragon[/url][color=#ff0000]    Made By       [/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3140055]Zerofrost[/url]
[url=https://www.google.com.au/url?sa=t&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=web&cd=1&ved=0ahUKEwiuhpSd79zLAhVn4qYKHT8kDioQFggbMAA&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fmods%2F25476&usg=AFQjCNFMUoqYDoUXOZNa9sRmmRDycuS51w&sig2=wJAC4tx5HHYHGN1coEGdRA&bvm=bv.117868183,d.dGY&cad=rja]Evil MasterMind Armor[/url][color=#ff0000]                                   Made By       [/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3140055]Zerofrost
Daedric Mage Armor [/url][color=#ff0000]                                     Made By       [/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2102930]Natterforme
[/url][url=https://www.google.com.au/url?sa=t&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=web&cd=1&sqi=2&ved=0ahUKEwiBjfuQ3uDLAhXFJaYKHblDA-8QFggbMAA&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fmods%2F8655%2F&usg=AFQjCNHVPXJPFSPmcHIWFXWQajXdsPihhw&sig2=ke-J129SBrC9plHuDiz3rA&bvm=bv.117868183,d.dGY&cad=rja]Static Mesh Improvement Mod[/url][color=#ff0000]                        Made By       [/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/283020]Brumbek[/url]

[color=#ff0000][color=#ff0000]PLEASE NOTE THE ERRORS:[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Holding mennimarcos staff will permanently make your eyes glow![/color]
[color=#ff0000]The Titan at the dark anchor has his model broken and i don't know how to fix it.[/color]
[color=#ff0000]This mod is not completed so expect errors.[/color]
